      • setErrorMode

        public void setErrorMode(@NonNull
                         InputLayout.ErrorMode errorMode)
        Changes error message mode. Nothing will be shown until error text is set. Can be set from xml using `carbon_errorMode`.
        Parameters:
        errorMode - error message mode

      • setErrorEnabled

        @Deprecated
public void setErrorEnabled(boolean errorVisible)
        Deprecated. 
        Deprecated use carbon.widget.InputLayout.setErrorMode instead.
        Parameters:
        errorVisible - true to make error messages show when the underlying InputView is invalid
